content.body:
```js
const { on, map, filter, run } = Emitter

run(
  on(document, 'click')
, filter(ev => ev.target.tagName === 'BUTTON')
, map(ev => ({ x: ev.clientX, y: ev.clientY }))
, coords => console.log(coords)
)
```
